posts.author: jeacontece
posts.title: SOLEDADE – Legislativo instalará canal online para aproximar comunidade da Casa
posts.text:
SOLEDADE – Legislativo instalará canal online para aproximar comunidade da Casa Postado em 7 de novembro de 2017 
Aproximação veio através de ouvidoria parlamentar aprovada pelo Legislativo soledadense 
A Câmara de Vereadores de Soledade começa a se preparar para uma novo sistema que será implementado através do site do Legislativo soledadense. Esta novidade virá através de uma ouvidoria parlamentar instaurada pelo Legislativo de Soledade aprovada por unanimidade pelos vereadores soledadenses. 
A ouvidoria é um instrumento de interlocução da comunidade soledadense e a câmara, que deverá funcionar através do site www.camarasoledade.rs.gov.br/ após a escolha do ouvidor titular. 
Isso deverá acontecer através de nomeação do presidente do Legislativo, Ilânio Casagrande Guerra, que poderá escolher também um ouvidor substituto. 
Para o assessor jurídico da câmara, Rodrigo Kunz, desde 2011 há a cobrança por uma ouvidoria para que haja mais transparência nas Câmaras. “O objetivo principal é ter um canal de comunicação entre a sociedade e o legislativo”, afirmou. 
A ouvidoria funcionará no site da câmara onde um canal será aberto para a comunidade o cidadão poderá realizar suas perguntas ao Legislativo. Tudo aquilo que for competência do órgão, terá um prazo de 15 dias para ser respondido. 
A designação do ouvidor deverá ser feita na sessão ordinária desta segunda-feira, 06/11. 
(Rádio Cristal) Publicado em Destaques , Geral

posts.title: Elderly woman sexually assaulted at railway station | Lismore Echo
posts.text:
Elderly woman sexually assaulted at railway station 7th Nov 2017 7:40 AM by WES HOSKING, Herald Sun 
A TRAIN-RIDING creep kissed an elderly woman on the cheek before sexually assaulting her in bayside Melbourne. Detectives wish to speak to this man after an 87-year-old woman was sexually assaulted at Aspendale Railway Station. Victoria Police 
The 87-year-old victim - who uses a walker - was waiting for a train at Aspendale Railway Station on September 22 about 11.25am when an unknown man called out to her. 
He asked if she wanted money and she declined. The man then kissed the woman and attacked her. She broke free and boarded the train. 
It's believed the offender boarded a Frankston-bound train and disembarked at Carrum Railway Station just before noon. 
Transit Crime Investigation Unit detectives have released an image of a man they believe can assist with inquiries. 
He appeared caucasian with brown hair, facial hair and was of medium build. 
He wore a black jacket and blue jeans. 
Anyone with information is urged to contact Crime Stoppers via 1800 333 00 or crimestoppersvic.com.au.

posts.text:
İlk adım atıldı! 16 firmadan teklif 12:05 07 Kasım 2017 İlk adım atıldı! 16 firmadan teklif Gebze, Dilovası, Başiskele ve Karamürsel ilçelerini kent meydanlarıyla buluşturan İzmit’te ise yapımını sürdüren Kocaeli Büyükşehir Belediyesi, Kartepe ilçesine de meydan yapmak için ilk adımı attı. A+ A- 
Sarımeşe ve İstasyon Mahalleleri arsında yer alan Fatih Sultan Mehmet Mahallesi’ndeki 30 bin metrekarelik alanda gerçekleştirilecek Kartepe Kent Meydanı projesi için ihale düzenlendi. İhaleye 16 firma teklif sunarken kent meydanı bir yıl içerisinde tamamlanarak hizmete sunulması planlanıyor. İçerisinde sosyal alanların da yer alacağı meydanda her biri 109 metrekare olmak üzere 3 adet kafeterya, 2 adet animasyonlu süs havuzu bulunacak. Meydan amfiler, çeşitli ağaç ve bitki görselleri arasına kurulacak oturma bankları ile renklendirilecek.Yer yer yeşil alanların bulunacağı meydanda otomatik sulama sistemi yapılacak. Meydanın zemin kaplaması olarak doğal taşlardan granit ve bazalt plak taşlar tercih kullanılacak. Ayrıca meydanın mimari yapısını destekleyen yeni nesil dekoratif aydınlatma elemanları ile aydınlatma yapılacak. Bu haber toplam 2016 defa okunmuştur

thread.title: “Infrastructure and cities development is vital to support growth”: new RICS President
thread.title_full: “Infrastructure and cities development is vital to support growth”: new RICS President

posts.author: James
posts.title: “Infrastructure and cities development is vital to support growth”: new RICS President
posts.text:
0 
HONG KONG, CHINA–(Marketwired – Nov 7, 2017) – John Hughes FRICS today becomes RICS President 2017-18, at an inauguration in Toronto, Canada. 
Mr Hughes is a founding partner of Hemson Consulting Ltd, an advisory firm specialising in planning policy, municipal finance and related issues. With over 40 years' experience in the industry, he is the first RICS President based in Canada. 
Mr Hughes becomes President in the year Canada celebrates the 150 th anniversary of Confederation. In 2018, RICS — a global professional body working across land, real estate, construction and infrastructure – will also celebrate its 150 th anniversary. 
The anniversary offers an opportunity to celebrate RICS' past, while ensuring the profession is ready to meet future challenges in the built environment. The celebrations include a global competition to identify solutions to the most pressing challenges facing rapidly growing cities. 
Mr Hughes said, “Infrastructure is vital to the successful growth of sustainable cities. We must develop more commercially innovative approaches to delivering projects that are affordable and on time. To meet this challenge the shortage of skills and capacity must be addressed together with the rights of land owners, and others who are affected by projects. RICS has a public interest perspective and provides international standards that increase transparency which, together, can help to balance the needs of different groups”. 
RICS will redouble its efforts to fulfil this commitment when it convenes the third Summit of the World Built Environment Forum in London in April 2018. Under the theme 'Urbanisation, Innovation and Civilisation', the Summit will focus on the commercial strategies needed to harness the enormous potential of the 21st century's people and places. 
Joining Mr. Hughes in the RICS Presidential Team over the next year are RICS President-Elect Chris Brooke FRICS, based in Hong Kong, and RICS Senior Vice President Tim Neal FRICS, based in London . 
About RICS 
Confidence through professional standards 
RICS promotes and enforces the highest professional qualifications and standards in the development and management of land, real estate, construction and infrastructure. Our name promises the consistent delivery of standards – bringing confidence to the markets we serve. 
We accredit 125,000 professionals and any individual or firm registered with RICS is subject to our quality assurance. Their expertise covers property, asset valuation, real estate management; the development of infrastructure; and the management of natural resources, such as mining, farms and woodland. From environmental assessments and building controls to negotiating land rights in an emerging economy; if our members are involved the same professional standards and ethics apply. 
We believe that standards underpin effective markets. With up to seventy per cent of the world's wealth bound up in land and real estate, our sector is vital to economic development, helping to support stable, sustainable investment and growth around the globe. 
With offices covering the major political and financial centres of the world, our market presence means we are ideally placed to influence policy and embed professional standards. We work at a cross-governmental level, delivering international standards that will support a safe and vibrant marketplace in land, real estate, construction and infrastructure, for the benefit of all. 
We are proud of our reputation and work hard to protect it, so clients who work with an RICS professional can have confidence in the quality and ethics of the services they receive.

thread.title: Bélgica resolverá el próximo día 17 si entrega a Puigdemont
thread.title_full: Bélgica resolverá el próximo día 17 si entrega a Puigdemont

posts.author: SILVIA MARTÍNEZ
posts.title: Bélgica resolverá el próximo día 17 si entrega a Puigdemont
posts.text:
EN MANOS DEL JUEZ DE BRUSELAS Bélgica resolverá el próximo día 17 si entrega a Puigdemont «Defenderemos nuestros derechos hasta el final», afirma SILVIA MARTÍNEZ 07/11/2017 
El expresidente de la Generalitat Carles Puigdemont y los cuatro exconsellers que permanecen en Bélgica volverán a comparecer la próxima semana en los juzgados belgas. Será, según ha confirmado la Fiscalía de Bruselas, el viernes 17 de noviembre en la Cámara del Consejo de Bruselas –un tribunal de primera instancia- que deberá decidir si ejecuta o no la orden europea de detención y entrega solicitada por España. 
La vista tendrá lugar en el Gran Palais, el mastodóntico Palacio de Justicia que está en permanente renovación desde hace décadas. El juez escuchará de nuevo uno a uno a cada uno de los cinco políticos catalanes, en audiencias individuales y a puerta cerrada, que se celebrarán en neerlandés, la lengua escogida por todos ellos para el procedimiento. 
Los cinco políticos catalanes –Puigdemont, Toni Comín, Meritxell Serret, Clara Ponsatí y Lluis Puig- se entregaron voluntariamente a primera hora del domingo en una comisaría del centro de Bruselas. Al filo de la medianoche el juez de instrucción encargado de decidir sobre su detención/liberación determinó que no presentaban un riesgo de fuga inminente y decidió liberarlos con condiciones: prohibición de abandonar Bélgica sin la autorización del juez de instrucción, la obligación de residir en una dirección fija (sea una hotel o un piso alquilado) y, por último, la obligació 
CAMPAÑA ELECTORAL / Estas medidas permitirán a Puigdemont hacer vida normal en Bruselas e incluso campaña electoral para el 21-D. De hecho hoy se espera el desembarco en la capital belga de 200 alcaldes independentistas procedentes de Cataluña para «apoyar al Govern» cesado y para denunciar ante las instituciones europeas «la actual situación política y judicial». A la 1 del mediodía se concentrarán frente a la sede de la Comisión Europea y cerrarán la jornada con un acto convocado por la asociación de municipios catalanes y al que bien podría asistir Puigdemont. 
Según los plazos, la Cámara del Consejo de Bruselas tiene ahora 15 días para decidir si ejecuta o no la euroorden aunque este plazo, según fuentes de la fiscalía, no es cerrado y podría prolongarse si el juez considera que necesita información adicional de España o si la defensa pide más tiempo. 
Los abogados de Puigdemont podrán alegar riesgo real de violación de sus derechos fundamentales pero tendrán que concretar con detalle sus alegaciones porque la euroorden parte de la base de que los países de la UE son seguros. Si determina que Puigdemont y los cuatro exconsellers deben ser entregados a España, sus abogados –Paul Bekaert y Michele Hirsch, que representa a Comín y Serret- podrían presentar recurso ante un tribunal de apelaciones que tendría otros 15 días para decidir. Si el veredicto es contrario a los intereses de los cinco políticos, estos tendrían todavía una última oportunidad de presentar recurso en casación, cuyo magistrado tendría otros 15 días para decidir. Es decir, el proceso podría prolongarse más allá de las elecciones del 21-D. Quien no podrá recurrir en todo el proceso es España. 
Por otra parte, el vicepresidente de la Generalitat cesado, Oriol Junqueras, ha alegado en su recurso ante la Audiencia Nacional que sufre «una situación de indefensión evidente», con su encarcelamiento. Asimismo, alega que con esta medida cautelar se vulnera su derecho «a la participación política»

thread.title: BT kündigt umfassende Weiterentwicklung seiner "Cloud of Clouds" mit Amazon Web Services an
thread.title_full: BT kündigt umfassende Weiterentwicklung seiner "Cloud of Clouds" mit Amazon Web Services an

posts.title: BT kündigt umfassende Weiterentwicklung seiner "Cloud of Clouds" mit Amazon Web Services an
posts.text:
BT kündigt umfassende Weiterentwicklung seiner "Cloud of Clouds" mit Amazon Web Services an 
Zürich-Wallisellen - Der Netzwerk- und IT-Dienstleister BT hat eine strategische Zusammenarbeit mit Amazon Web Services (AWS) angekündigt. Mit diesem Schritt baut BT seine führende Position als treibende Kraft bei Cloud Services weiter aus und wird Kunden rund um die Welt dabei unterstützen, die Vorteile von AWS voll auszuschöpfen. 
Die Zusammenarbeit ist ein bedeutender Meilenstein bei der Weiterentwicklung der "Cloud of Clouds" Portfolio-Strategie von BT, die die Kunden einfach und sicher mit den von ihnen benötigten Anwendungen und Daten verbindet. Als Beratungspartner des AWS Partner Netzwerks (APN) hat BT bereits zahlreiche multinationale Unternehmen an die AWS Cloud angebunden. 
Die heutige Ankündigung hebt die Kooperation zwischen BT und AWS auf eine neue Stufe und legt den Fokus auf Netzwerks-, Sicherheits- und Managed-Cloud-Services. Dadurch soll die Art und Weise verändert werden, wie Unternehmenskunden AWS in großem Massstab nutzen. Dies beinhaltet sowohl die Einführung neuer Kundeninitiativen wie BTs "hybrid cloud landing zone" als auch weitere Forschung und Innovation bei der Weiterentwicklung von Netzwerkdiensten sowie einen umfassenden Ansatz für die Sicherheit in der Cloud. So wird die weltweite Nutzung von AWS für Unternehmenskunden verbessert und der Weg in die Cloud beschleunigt. 
Die "hybrid cloud landing zone" von BT besteht aus einer Reihe von integrierten Tools und Designs für die Implementierung von Cloud-Anwendungen. Mit vorgefertigten Templates wird die Bereitstellung von Hybrid Clouds in verschiedenen Regionen und Cloud-Umgebungen, insbesondere AWS, vereinfacht. Diese Lösung wurde entwickelt, um Kunden die Verwaltung von mehreren hybriden Cloud-Umgebungen zu erleichtern, virtuelle Netzwerke zwischen mehreren geografischen Regionen aufzubauen und die höchsten Sicherheitsstandards in hybriden Cloud-Umgebungen zu erreichen. 
Die gebrauchsfertigen Templates nutzen ...

thread.title: Natwest Fixed term ending 31/01/2018 What should we do??
thread.title_full: Natwest Fixed term ending 31/01/2018 What should we do?? - MoneySavingExpert.com Forums

posts.author: Edi81
posts.text:
Mortgages have changed since you took yours out in 2012. Lenders need to assess your ability to pay at interest rates of 7-8% not just the current rate.
If there is anything in your circumstances- late payments , high levels of credit cards to income - you are best to use a broker. Otherwise, apply directly.
Not all brokers charge a fee - if you do go down a broker route do not pay anything until they have secured you an offer.

thread.title: Sitting at Tables
thread.title_full: Sitting at Tables

posts.author: Christina (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Sitting at Tables
posts.text:
Secret.  Life often sucks.  This morning I am thinking of several friends, friends of friends, or current news.  Every person who occupies a space in my head has a story of hurt.  The hurt is real enough that it could overtake them.  The ones that I know personally who are hurting make me hurt, too.  Funny how we humans empathize with friends.  This must be how God feels when we hurt.  After all, we are made in the image of the One who whispered life into our bodies.

Secret.  I love order.  Usually, this love of order spills right into my morning routine (the fact that I said routine should be a blatant give-a-way of my love of order).  I usually have a plan of what to read in my Bible.  From that plan, I write insights, prayers, heart moments.  This morning, no plan.  The weight of the hurt from others weighs me down in heavy clothes and mood.  The only plan I have is to seek the One who knows the hurt.

Secret.  I love David.  Often schizophrenic in His approach to God, I can relate.  He bears all, this man after God's own heart.  He rises on heights seemingly too high for mere mortals and then falls so deep the dark overtakes him.  The only consistency in his writing is that he knows - KNOWS - the One to whom he praises or bellows from his belly

"Save me from my enemies!" "Arise in anger!" "Rule over those who threaten to overtake me!" "Kick my enemies in the teeth!" (personal favorite) 

Sounds desperate?  Desperate and real.  Yet in these moments of letting emotion mote and feelings feel he follows up with:

"God is my shield." 
"God is an honest judge." 
"I will thank the Lord who is just." 

He knows himself.  He is not his own shield, an honest judge, or just when it comes to his enemies.  In the heat of the moment, we often misplace our pain.  We place it on God, ourselves, others and beg that it be erased, immediately.  But what I see in our friend, David, is that he overturns his natural tendency to spout unreal sentiments in the heat of the moment and surrender his feelings to the authority of God.

Secret.  I love promises.  When someone promises me they will do something, bring me something, offer me something ... I delight.  When God gives me a promise, I hold on for dear life.  I hold on too tightly, afraid, in fact, that the circumstances I find myself in will somehow have the power to undo the promise given and make me hurt all the more.  Can we all just recognize that as a lie?

A promise - in the middle of pain - doesn't always erase the pain or change my circumstances but it gives me HOPE.  The kind of hope that Psalm 37 speaks about ... "trust in the Lord and do good and you will live safely in the land and prosper."  Trust - in the middle of the pain - the promise of God.

Finally, I love that David gives a visual of this because visual learner that I am, I need a picture.  Here's the picture.  A table.  A table in the middle of chaos.  Psalm 23:5 paints a beautiful picture of what holding on to a promise in the middle of pain looks like, "He prepares a table before me in the presence of my enemies."  A promise from God is a certificate of authority.  Use it and trust it.  It's your ticket toward resting in the middle of pain and not succumbing to it.

Sitting at a table ...
Christina

thread.title: 2018 Physician Career Fair Schedule Released by PracticeMatch
thread.title_full: 2018 Physician Career Fair Schedule Released by PracticeMatch

posts.author: admincguide
posts.title: 2018 Physician Career Fair Schedule Released by PracticeMatch
posts.text:
2018 Physician Career Fair Schedule Released by PracticeMatch Posted on Print Mike York, COO, PracticeMatch 
Career fairs offer physicians and clinicians a valuable opportunity they can’t get anywhere else, to engage face-to-face with several top local healthcare employers at a single event. St. Louis, MO (PRWEB) November 07, 2017 PracticeMatch, a company that provides a physician database, job boards, and staffing resources to healthcare employers nationwide, released its schedule of physician career fairs to occur throughout 2018 across the country. Due to the popularity and success of its new virtual (online) career fairs introduced this year, PracticeMatch will provide more virtual career events in 2018 to complement its live, on-site recruiting fairs. The schedule of live, on-site career fairs for the first half of the year is as follows: St. Louis, MO – March 1, 2018 Cleveland, OH – March 20, 2018 Chicago, IL – March 24, 2018 New York, NY – April 7, 2018 Recruiting activities typically slow down in the summer, so there will be no fairs from May through July. PracticeMatch career fairs will resume in August, with events that month in Kansas City, MO, Detroit, MI, Dallas, TX, and Baltimore, MD. The Los Angeles career fair will be held in September, followed by Houston, TX. In October, career fairs will be held for physicians and employers in Philadelphia, New York City, and St. Louis. The last events of the year will occur in Chicago and Cleveland, OH, in November of 2018. The complete schedule for the 2018 calendar year of national physician career fairs is located on the PracticeMatch website . “We look forward to another exciting year of successful career fairs,” states Mike York, chief operations officer of PracticeMatch. “We consistently receive very positive feedback about the career fair experience from employers and physicians who attend. Physician job seekers find it very helpful to meet with several local employers in one event, and employers really enjoy seeing the person behind the CV. Attending a career fair facilitates your job search and eliminates a lot of guesswork from the process.” A survey of 2017 career fair attendees revealed that a large majority of physicians (83 percent) viewed the experience as a valuable one. Nearly three-fourths of career fair attendees (74 percent) indicated that they actively engaged with three or more employers at the event, while more than a third of attendees spoke with five or more employers. “Career fairs offer physicians and clinicians a valuable opportunity they can’t get anywhere else, to engage face-to-face with several top local healthcare employers at a single event,” York adds. “Any motivated healthcare professional seeking a physician practice opportunity or advanced practice job will learn a great deal about what the local job market bears, interact with top local healthcare employers, and also possibly explore national opportunities as well if desired.” To view the schedule or register for an event, visit https://www.practicematch.com/physicians/career-fairs-and-events/career-fairs.cfm . About PracticeMatch: PracticeMatch is one of the most established service companies in the physician recruiting industry, and its Pinpoint physician database includes over 338,000 interviewed physicians. Founded more than 25 years ago, PracticeMatch provides candidate leads and recruiting resources to match pre-screened candidates directly with healthcare employers on a national basis. Based in Saint Louis, MO, the company annually conducts 30+ physician career fairs nationwide. For media inquiries, or to schedule an interview with a PracticeMatch executive, please contact Andrea Clement, aclement(at)usa(dot)m3.com. For more information regarding healthcare recruiting services and resources provided by PracticeMatch, please contact Mike York, (800) 489-1440 mike.york(at)practicematch(dot)com. # # #

thread.title: Fans furious over Stranger Things ‘kiss’ scene | Lismore Echo
thread.title_full: Fans furious over Stranger Things ‘kiss’ scene | Lismore Echo

posts.author: Use This Content
posts.title: Fans furious over Stranger Things ‘kiss’ scene | Lismore Echo
posts.text:
Fans furious over Stranger Things ‘kiss’ scene 7th Nov 2017 6:40 AM Use this content by Bronte Coy 
THERE'S a lot that can be said about Stranger Things' fun but somewhat inconsistent second season, but we can all agree on one thing - that ending was damn delightful. 
WARNING: Spoilers ahead. 
During one magical middle school dance, we saw puppy love play out in the form of not one but two kisses between major cast members. However, knowing the backstory of one of those kisses makes it a little less adorable. 
In season two's final episode, "Chapter 9: the Gate," Max (Sadie Sink) and Lucas (Caleb McLaughlin) share a kiss. It's a sweet moment particularly because so much time was spent exploring the chemistry between the duo this season. 
However, during an episode of Beyond Stranger Things , the series' after-show talk show, Sink was quick to point out that the Max and Lucas kiss wasn't originally in the script. Things only got weirdly heated from there. 
The 15-year-old actress is clearly upset as she explains the shock of learning that she had to do an onscreen kiss without any forewarning. She admitted the looming kiss stressed her out. "One of you, I think it was you Ross, you say, 'Ooh, Sadie, you ready for the kiss?' I'm like, 'What! No! That's not in the script … that's not happening," Sink said. 
In response, the Duffer brothers didn't console her or apologise. 
Instead, Ross Duffer told Sink that adding in the kiss was her fault. According to Duffer, they originally brought up the kiss as a joke, but Sink's reaction prompted them to include it in the episode. "You reacted so strongly to this. I was just joking, And you were so freaked out that I was like well, I gotta make her do it now," the director said. "That's why I'm saying it's your fault." 
The story about the kiss has angered some fans, especially during a climate when more attention than ever is being paid to questionable sexual practices in Hollywood. Apparently it goes deeper than adults leering at #StrangerThings child actors. This interview is plain terrifying. https://t.co/tPSgPi77Ub — seriously hilary (@seriouslyhilary) November 5, 2017 The two grown men that created Stranger Things forced a child to kiss another child while they filmed. — Aura Bogado (@aurabogado) November 4, 2017 
However, it's a thread by Twitter user Anna Marquardt that sums up the outrage best. The young actress who plays Max, Sadie Sink, is talking about having a kiss with [redacted] in the last episode. — Anna Marquardt (@ajlobster) October 31, 2017 
The Duffer brothers have yet to address this criticism. 
This story was originally published in Decider. Related Items

thread.title: 지혜있는 사람의 인생덕목
thread.title_full: 지혜있는 사람의 인생덕목

posts.author: 가을날의동화
posts.title: 지혜있는 사람의 인생덕목
posts.text:
지혜있는 사람의 인생덕목
﻿
﻿ 노점상
할머니 등 노점상에서 물건을 살 때 깎지 말라.
그냥 돈을 주면 나태함을 키우지만
부르는 대로 주고 사면 희망과 건강을
선물하는 것이다.
﻿
﻿ 웃음(笑)
웃는 연습을 생활화하라.
웃음은 만병의 예방약이며 치료약이며
노인을 젊게 하고 젊은이를 동자(童子)로 만든다.
﻿
﻿ TV(바보상자)
텔레비젼과 많은 시간 동거하지 말라.
술에 취하면 정신을 잃고 마약에 취하면 이성을
잃지만 텔레비젼에 취하면 모든 게 마비된
바보가 된다.
﻿
﻿ 성냄(禍)
화내는 사람이 언제나 손해를 본다.
화내는 사람은 자기를 죽이고 남을 죽이며
아무도 가깝게 오지 않아서 늘 외롭고 쓸쓸하다.
﻿
﻿ 기도(祈禱)
기도는 녹슨 쇳덩이도 녹이며
천년 암흑 동굴의 어둠을 없애는 한 줄기 빛이다.
주먹을 불끈 쥐기보다 두 손을 모으고
기도하는 자가 더 강하다.
기도는 자성을 찾게하며 만생을 유익하게
하는 묘약이다.
﻿
﻿ 이웃(隣)
이웃과 절대로 등지지 말라.
이웃은 나의 모습을 비추어보는 큰 거울이다.
이웃이 나를 마주할 때 외면하거나 미소를
보내지 않으면 목욕하고 바르게 앉아 자신을
곰곰이 되돌아봐야 한다.
﻿
﻿ 사랑(慈愛)
머리와 입으로 하는 사랑에는 향기가 없다.
진정한 사랑은 이해. 관용. 포용. 동화. 자기
낮춤이 선행된다.
존경하는 김수환 추기경 말씀, "사랑이 머리에서
가슴으로 내려오는 데 70년 걸렸다."
﻿
﻿ 멈춤(止觀)
가끔은 칠흑 같은 어두운 방에서 자신을 바라보라.
마음의 눈으로...마음의 가슴으로...주인공이 되어
"나는 누구인가...어디서 왔나...어디로 가나"
조급함이 사라지고 삶에 대한 여유로움이 생기나니.
﻿
말(言)
말을 많이 하면 필요없는 말이 나온다.
두 귀로 많이 들으며 입은 세 번 생각하고 열라.
﻿
﻿ 책(讀書)
수입의 1%를 책을 사는 데 투자하라.
옷이 해지면 입을 수 없어 버리지만
책은 시간이 지나도 위대한 진가를 품고 있다.
﻿
﻿ -좋 은 글 중 에 서 -

thread.title: Fachin deja Podem y busca una coalición para ir al 21-D
thread.title_full: Fachin deja Podem y busca una coalición para ir al 21-D

posts.author: ROGER PASCUAL BARCELONA
posts.title: Fachin deja Podem y busca una coalición para ir al 21-D
posts.text:
ROGER PASCUAL BARCELONA 07/11/2017 
ía Winston Churchill que «algunos hombres cambian de partido por el bien de sus principios; otros sus principios por el bien de su partido». Una reflexión que resume los motivos que dio ayer Albano Dante Fachin para dejar Podem y, a la vez, atacar a un Pablo Iglesias que considera que ha traicionado el espíritu con el que nació Podemos. El ya exlíder morado anunció la creación de un partido instrumental para ir en alguna coalición a las elecciones del 21-D. 
Fachin explicó que había decidido dimitir como secretario general de Podem y darse también de baja como militante por la «intervención» de la organización catalana por parte de Iglesias, una actitud que tachó de «decretazo». «Ha sido una destitución de facto. ‘O te vas o te cesamos’», sostuvo. Después de poner en duda las garantías de la consulta que Podemos ha forzado en sus bases catalanas sobre la confluencia de comuns, Fachin atacó no solo a Iglesias, sino también a Xavier Domènech. «No contestó a mis mensajes para hablar sobre la confluencia y prefirió que Iglesias solucionara el asunto desde Madrid», denunció. 
El nuevo partido instrumental, en el que le acompañarán varios compañeros de la dirección podemista, ya está registrado. No pretende ser una escisión de Podem, sino que se crea solamente para concurrir a las elecciones del 21 de diciembre en coalición con otras formaciones en un «frente común» contra el artículo 155 del PP. Procés Constituent y la CUP podrían ser compañeros en este viaje, en el que ve difícil, por no decir imposible, ir de la mano del PDECat. «Pero no ficharé por otro partido. No iré en la lista de la CUP o de Esquerra Republicana», quiso dejar claro ayer.

thread.title: 명함 관리 팁, 효율적으로 비즈니스 관리하기
thread.title_full: 명함 관리 팁, 효율적으로 비즈니스 관리하기 : 네이버 블로그

posts.author: 메이아이 플래닝
posts.title: 명함 관리 팁, 효율적으로 비즈니스 관리하기
posts.text:
롱런하는 비즈니스 명함 관리 팁, 효율적으로 비즈니스 관리하기 2시간 전 URL 복사 본문 기타 기능 번역보기 http://blog.mayiplanning.com/221134654459 비즈니스를 운영하다 보면 수많은 명함을 받게 되는데요. 정작 필요할 때 바로 찾아지지 않고 이 명함이 내가 찾는 사람의 것이 맞는지 기억이 가물가물한 경우도 많습니다. 어떻게 하면 더욱 효율적으로 명함을 관리할 수 있을까요?
명함관리 어플 사용하기 명함을 관리해주는 어플을 활용해보세요. 명함을 찍으면 자동으로 문자를 인식해 핸드폰 주소록에 저장해 주는 기능은 기본이고 전화가 오면 해당 명함 이미지를 함께 호출해 주거나 회원 간 선물하기 기능까지 있습니다.
[출처] 리멤버 홈페이지 저 같은 경우 어플을 따로 사용하는 것이 번거로워 기존에 사용하고 있는 에버노트를 활용하고 있습니다. 에버노트에 명함 사진을 찍어 저장해두면 검색 기능을 이용해 손쉽게 정보를 찾을 수 있습니다. (명함 이미지 내 문자도 자동으로 인식하여 검색됩니다.)
[출처] 에버노트 웹사이트 핸드폰 주소록에 연락처를 따로 저장해야 하는 번거로움이 있지만 명함을 받은 모든 사람들의 연락처를 저장하지는 않기 때문에 충분히 감수할 수 있는 단점인 것 같습니다. 에버노트는 추가 정보를 자유롭게 덧붙일 수 있고 이미지 내 문자와 기록된 정보 모두 빠르고 편리하게 검색이 가능합니다.
에버노트(Evernote)로 스마트하고 스트레스 없는 비즈니스 만들기 비즈니스를 운영하다 보면 중요한 문서들, 여기저기서 쏟아지는 정보와 아이디어 등 관리해야 하는 것들이 ... blog.mayiplanning.com 만난 사람을 기억하기 위한 메모 남기기 명함을 받고 나면 명함 한편에 추가 정보를 간단히 메모해주세요. 명함을 받을 때는 정확하게 기억할 수 있을 것 같지만 시간이 지나면 모두 기억하기가 힘이 듭니다. 명함을 받고 나면 바로 명함 한편에 기록하거나 어플을 사용할 경우 추가 메모 기능을 활용할 수 있습니다.
[명함과 함께 기록하면 좋은 정보]
명함 받은 날짜와 장소, 소개해 준 사람 또는 알게 된 경위, 인상착의 또는 간단한 특징,
© TeroVesalainen, 출처 Pixabay 직원과 함께 공유하는 명함 정보 거래처 별 영업 담당자나 주요 AS 연락처 등 업무상 직원들과 공유해야 하는 정보들은 따로 카테고리를 만들어 공유해 보세요. 직원 개개인이나 나의 개인적인 정보가 아닌 비즈니스 공통 정보로 관리되어야 효율적으로 업무를 처리할 수 있습니다. 에버노트의 경우 카테고리 단위로(노트북) 공유할 수 있는 기능이 있습니다.

thread.title: Clariant : signs MOU with Shanghai University to collaborate on innovation | 4-Traders
thread.title_full: Clariant : signs MOU with Shanghai University to collaborate on innovation | 4-Traders

posts.author: www.4-traders.com
posts.title: Clariant : signs MOU with Shanghai University to collaborate on innovation | 4-Traders
posts.text:
Clariant reaches out to academic sector in China to continue the momentum of local collaborative innovation Memorandum of Understanding signed with Shanghai University to embark on long-term exchange and collaboration on R&D projects Closer collaboration to benefit University students with internship and career development opportunities at Clariant 
Shanghai, November 7, 2017 - Clariant, a world-leader in specialty chemicals, signed an Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) with Shanghai University yesterday to embark on long-term collaboration that will facilitate joint R&D efforts on technological innovation and allow students of Shanghai University to gain industry and business exposure through internship and company visit to Clariant. 'We are excited to build this close collaboration with Shanghai University - a long-established educational institution in China known for its research strengths,' said Jack Chen, Head of Research Center Clariant China, who signed the MOU on behalf of Clariant, 'This cooperation will enable us to jointly develop sound innovative projects to benefit our chemical industry in China.' 
One key area highlighted by the MOU is the emphasis on exchange between the two organizations through hosting of seminars and developing of collaborative projects, which is encouraged on the provincial level in China to encourage more local R&D activities. In addition, the MOU will also see students from Shanghai University being taken on site visit and internship at Clariant. With proper guidance and mentorship, the students will be able to learn first-hand the operation of a global chemical company, which will benefit them in developing their future career. 
'Clariant is a well-known international chemical company in China. Our partnership will certainly provide big incentives for our research teams to jointly develop industry-ready solutions dedicated to various sectors in China. Our students will also benefit through their close encounter with Clariant staff to learn the reality in the business world,' said Professor Siyi Gong, Deputy Secretary of Party Committee, Vice President of Shanghai University. 
Signing of the MOU has kept the momentum going for fostering innovation at Clariant. The company's commitment to innovation in China was demonstrated recently in September, when it launched its Innovation Fair in order to align the industry in further collaboration on the research forefront. At the fair, a Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) was signed between the China Petroleum Chemical Industry Federation (CPCIF) and Clariant to help promote innovation and enhance sustainability development in the industry. In addition, the CPCIF-Clariant CleanTech Award was announced, which will recognize young local researchers' achievements in sustainable chemical technologies. 
In addition, Clariant is also fully committed to industry development in China. In October, Clariant sponsored the Achievement Award presented during the 18th Chinese National Congress on Catalysis to recognize individual contribution made on a major R&D achievement in the catalysis field of China. 
Clariant AG published this content on 07 November 2017 and is solely responsible for the information contained herein.

posts.title: Absolutely Disgusting Service, Worst Insurer by far
posts.text: 3 cars were parked (one of which was ours and 2 neighbours), a drunk driver smashed into all 3 cars, completely writing off 2 of them and damaging a 3rd one. Disgusting customer service respresentatives who seem like they don't even care and don't bother making any progress regarding the case. 3 months later and the case is still in the exact same position as it was when the accident occurred. No costs have been recovered to compensate for the completely innocent total loss of my car. Car was assessed as total write-off BY THEIR OWN WOOLWORTHS insurance assessor and they have still failed to make any progress. A call has been made on a weekly basis to check for case progression and they simply reply "sorry mate, we cant provide you with any details". Seriously get a grip. The neighbour's car that was slightly damaged still hasn't been returned. After 3 months Absolute joke, don't waste your time and money and get a real insurer people. If anything they have made the process 2 times harder.

posts.title: الأحوال الجوية المتوقعة على ليبيا خلال الثلاثة الأيام القادمة .
posts.text: الأحوال الجوية المتوقعة على ليبيا خلال الثلاثة الأيام القادمة . الثلاثاء ، طرابلس 07 نوفمبر 2017 (وال)- الأحوال الجوية المتوقعة على ليبيا خلال الثلاثة الأيام القادمة ، اعتباراً من اليوم الثلاثاء ، وفقاً للنشرة الصادرة عن إدارة التنبؤات بالمركز الوطني للأرصاد الجوية . * ملخص عام : انخفاض طفيف في درجات الحرارة على مناطق شمال غرب ليبيا ، ويشمل خليج سرت ومناطق الشمال الشرقي يوم الغد ، بينما يبقى الطقس مستقر على مناطق الجنوب . * رأس إجدير حتى سرت - سهل الجفارة - جبل نفوسة : السماء صافية إلى قليلة السحب ،واحتمال ظهور شبورة مائية اخر الليل وصباح الباكر على الساحل الممتد مصراته إلى سرت ، والرياح جنوبية غربية إلى شمالية غربية خفيفة إلى معتدلة السرعة ، ودرجات الحرارة القصوى تتـراوح مـابين (17-24) درجة مئوية وتسجل انخفاض ملحوظ على المناطق الجبلية وتصل اليوم على منطقة ابونجيم وسرت إلى (20) درجة . * بن جواد - سهل بنغازى حتى أمساعد - جالو - مراده : السماء صافية إلى قليلة السحب تتكاثر يوم الغد على الجبل الاخضر ، والرياح جنوبية شرقية معتدلة السرعة تنشط احيانا هذا اليوم على بنغازي مثيرة للاثربه والغبار ، ودرجات الحرارة القصوى تتراوح مابين (25-30) درجة مئوية ، تتحول الرياح يوم الغد إلى جنوبية غربية فشمالية غربية معتدلة السرعة مع انخفاض تدريجي في درجات الحرارة . * الجفرة - سبها - غـات - غدامس -الحمادة : السماء قليلة السحب ، والرياح متغيرة الاتجاه خفيفة السرعة ، ودرجات الحرارة القصوى تتراوح مابين (24-29) درجة مئوية . * الكفرة - تازربو - السرير : السماء صافية إلى ظهور بعض السحب العابرة ، والرياح متغيرة الاتجاه إلى شمالية شرقية سرعتها بين الخفيفة والمعتدلة ، ودرجات الحــرارة القصوى تتراوح مابين (24-28) درجة مئوية . ...( وال )...

thread.title: Fonterra investit dans Rokiskio
thread.title_full: Fonterra investit dans Rokiskio

posts.author: James
posts.title: Fonterra investit dans Rokiskio
posts.text:
0 
AMSTERDAM , November 7, 2017 — 
Le groupe coopératif néo-zélandais Fonterra a approfondi sa coopération commerciale de longue date avec le plus grand producteur de lait lituanien, AB Rokiskio Suris, en acquérant 10 % des actions de la société. Dalius Trumpa and Theo Spierings signing agreement between Rokiskio and Fonterra. (PRNewsfoto/Fonterra) 
(Photo: http://mma.prnewswire.com/media/597069/Fonterra_Co_operative_Group.jpg ) 
Classée en 2017 par Rabobank comme la sixième plus grande société laitière au monde en chiffre d'affaires, Fonterra a investi 7,1 millions d'euros dans Rokiskio, s'assurant ainsi une ligne d'approvisionnement d'ingrédients à haute teneur en lactosérum, tout en ouvrant des options en termes de produits à l'échelle de l' Europe et du Moyen-Orient. Il s'agit également d'une occasion de se procurer des produits laitiers additionnels en provenance du bassin laitier baltique, afin de répondre à la demande croissante des marchés environnants. 
Le président de Fonterra, John Wilson , affirme que l'investissement est étroitement aligné sur la stratégie de Fonterra d'augmentation de ses sources mondiales de lait dans des emplacements stratégiques, tels que l' Europe , ce qui permet à la coopérative de répondre à la demande des consommateurs sur les marchés proches de ces sources. 
« Nos fermiers néo-zélandais demeureront toujours notre source principale de lait, mais nous soutenons de plus en plus notre croissance et leurs profits en ayant recours à des partenariats stratégiques en Europe , en Amérique latine, en Australie et en Chine. Ces partenariats nous permettent de produire les produits demandés tout en étant plus proches des marchés et en ouvrant davantage de débouchés au lait et aux produits laitiers que nous produisons ailleurs ». 
Theo Spierings , PDG de Fonterra, affirme que le développement se fonde sur les relations d'approvisionnement de longue date que Fonterra entretient avec Rokiskio, et qu'il profitera aux deux sociétés. 
« Notre capacité d'accès à des ingrédients à haute teneur en protéines devient de plus en plus importante avec l'augmentation de la demande, notamment sur les marchés de l' Europe occidentale et de l'Est, du Moyen-Orient et de l'Afrique du Nord. En outre, Rokiskio est un producteur de fromage très reconnu, ce qui ouvre d'autres débouchés pour satisfaire la demande des clients sur ces marchés. Il s'agit d'une nouvelle étape dans notre stratégie de développement d'un réseau durable d'approvisionnement européen, qui nous apportera une chaîne d'approvisionnement fiable et efficiente venant compléter nos ingrédients d'origine néo-zélandaise ». 
Le président de Rokiskio, Dalius Trumpa , affirme quant à lui que l'accent que Rokiskio met sur la qualité et la sécurité des produits, ainsi que ses performances environnementales, constituent des points forts de taille apportés par la société à son partenariat avec Fonterra. La fabrication en sous-traitance pour Fonterra avait joué un rôle dans les expansions des capacités et les modernisations de la société de 2014 et 2016, et il se dit optimiste concernant les opportunités de croissance à venir. 
« Nous avons travaillé en étroite collaboration en tant que partenaires commerciaux pendant cinq années, et pendant ce temps, nous avons tissé une relation forte. L'investissement de Fonterra dans Rokiskio Suris porte notre société à un nouveau niveau mondial, nous ouvrant des débouchés à l'exportation qui donneront lieu à une valeur ajoutée accrue pour notre bassin laitier local », indique M. Trumpa. « En accueillant Fonterra en tant qu'actionnaire, notre croissance à venir pourra s'accélérer, en pénétrant de nouveaux marchés et en investissant dans de nouvelles technologies ». 
Rokiskio possède trois usines en Lituanie et fabrique du fromage, du beurre, des protéines de lactosérum et du lait en poudre. Il s'agit de l'un des producteurs les plus importants et réputés de l' Europe centrale et de l'Est, avec une production annuelle de plus de 30 000 tonnes de fromage. La société exporte aussi bien sur les marchés de l'est que de l'ouest, et produit également un large éventail de produits laitiers frais pour la région baltique. 
À propos de Fonterra 
Fonterra est un chef de file mondial de la nutrition laitière (il s'agit du fournisseur favori d'ingrédients laitiers de nombreuses sociétés de premier plan mondiales). Fonterra est aussi un leader sur le marché, avec ses propres marques de produits laitiers grand public en Australie/Nouvelle-Zélande, Asie/Afrique, Moyen-Orient et Amérique latine. Pour en savoir plus : http://www.fonterra.com 
À propos de Rokiskio 
Pour en savoir plus : http://www.rokiskio.com 
LA SOURCE Fonterra

thread.title: The day that changed Ben Hunt’s career | Lismore Echo
thread.title_full: The day that changed Ben Hunt’s career | Lismore Echo

posts.title: The day that changed Ben Hunt’s career | Lismore Echo
posts.text:
The day that changed Ben Hunt’s career 7th Nov 2017 11:07 AM 0 MELBOURNE, AUSTRALIA - OCTOBER 24: Ben Hunt of Australia passes the ball during an Australian Kangaroos training session at Lakeside Stadium on October 24, 2017 in Melbourne, Australia. (Photo by Quinn Rooney/Getty Images) 
BEN Hunt says the indignity of being dropped by Brisbane coach Wayne Bennett may have been a turning point in his NRL season and career. 
Hunt has endured highs and lows like few others this year and aims to finish it a winner as part of Australia's Rugby League World Cup campaign. Being dropped mid-season to the Queensland Cup by Bennett gave him a new perspective on life and the game, he says. 
As well as making his State of Origin debut for Queensland in game three, the playmaker signed a big money five-year deal with St George Illawarra and was shifted to hooker for the final four games of the Broncos' season. On Sunday, he also got married to long-term partner Bridget Hagan. As Hunt puts it, it's been a "strange year". 
"I've had some of the biggest lows but some of the highest highs as well," he said. 
Asked if being dropped was a turning point, he said: "I think it might have been. 
"I don't think I was playing my best and getting put back there it made me just go back and enjoy some of my footy and play the way I know I can play." Hunt was granted a weekend leave pass by Kangaroos coach Mal Meninga to get married in Byron Bay. 
It meant missing Friday's win over France and he says he initially feared choosing love over footy would cost him a spot in the squad. "When I first talked to Mal, it was one of the most nervous talks I've had," he said. 
"But he was excellent. Straight from the start he was happy for me to go and get married." Related Items

thread.title: Dịch Thuật Tiếng Nhật Bản Nhanh Chóng Ở Quận Hai Bà Trưng
thread.title_full: Dịch Thuật Tiếng Nhật Bản Nhanh Chóng Ở Quận Hai Bà Trưng

posts.title: Dịch Thuật Tiếng Nhật Bản Nhanh Chóng Ở Quận Hai Bà Trưng
posts.text:
Mua quyền ưu tiên cho tin Dịch Thuật Tiếng Nhật Bản Nhanh Chóng Ở Quận Hai Bà Trưng Là 1 trong những nước có số người Việt đang sinh sống và học tập đông nhất trên toàn thế giới. Nước Nhật đang là điểm đến ở Châu Á mà được nhiều người quan tâm với cơ hội được theo học tại 1 trường đại học uy tín, cơ hội có 1 việc làm ổn định sau khi về nước,.v.v. cùng với đó là Hội đồng hương đang sinh sống rất đông có thể giúp đỡ lẫn nhau. Cộng thêm việc từ khi Việt Nam mở cửa kinh tế đặc biệt là từ khi đất nước ta gia nhập WTO, nhu cầu giao lưu văn hóa Quốc tế và hội nhập kinh tế ngày càng cao, kéo theo các công ty, doanh nghiệp tại Nhật Bản đầu tư vào Việt Nam càng mạnh mẽ hơn, bằng chứng là gần đây nhất việc tập đoàn xăng dầu nhật bản chính thức có trụ sở tại Việt Nam. Chính vì vậy nhu cầu dịch thuật tài liệu tiếng Nhật Bản đang thật sự phát triển mạnh thời gian vừa qua, rất nhiều hồ sơ tiếng Nhật hoặc tiếng Việt được dịch sang tiếng Nhật của các cá nhân, tổ chức mang đến Chúc Vinh Quý mỗi ngày. Biên dịch viên dịch tiếng Nhật tại công ty 100% được tuyển chọn từ những trường Đại học ngoại ngữ danh tiếng hàng đầu Việt Nam: Đại học Ngoại ngữ, Đại học Hà Nội, RMIT…kinh nghiệm ít nhất 3 năm trở lên. Bên cạnh đó nhằm mang lại những bản dịch chất lượng nhất kể cả dịch từ Tiếng Việt sang Tiếng Nhật và ngược lại. Dịch thuật Chúc Vinh Quý đã mời một đội ngũ biên dịch người bản địa nhằm cho ra một bản dịch không chỉ chuẩn về ngữ pháp mà còn chuẩn cả về văn phong cũng như đáp ứng tất cả các chuyên ngành dịch. Dịch vụ của chúng tôi như sau: - Dịch thuật Tiếng Nhật Bản chuyên ngành - Dịch thuật Tiếng Nhật Bản chuyên ngành Kỹ thuật Công nghệ - Dịch thuật Tiếng Nhật Bản Kinh tế - tài chính - ngân hàng - Dịch thuật Tiếng Nhật Bản chuyên ngành Pháp luật - Dịch thuật Tiếng Nhật Bản chuyên ngành Y dược - Dịch thuật website, truyền thông, quảng cáo Tiếng Nhật Bản - Dịch thuật Sách, tiểu thuyết và các tài liệu khác Tiếng Nhật Bản Giá dịch, hợp lý và cạnh tranh nhất Dịch thuật Chúc Vinh Quý luôn cố gắng đưa ra giá mức giá cạnh tranh nhất, hợp lý nhất và minh bạch nhất cho khách hàng của mình. posts.author: admincguide
posts.title: FACTON Announces North America User Conference
posts.text:
FACTON Announces North America User Conference Posted on Print FACTON CEO Alexander M. Swoboda to Present at North America User Conference 
Engineers, financial managers, sales executives, and procurement experts will all join us to share stories about how they are using FACTON EPC to increase profitability, improve their customer relationships, and win new business. Past News Releases 
RSS Troy, Michigan (PRWEB) November 07, 2017 FACTON, the leader in Enterprise Product Costing (EPC), today announced details for the company’s North America user conference, scheduled for November 9, 2017 at Emagine Theaters in Royal Oak, Michigan. Over 50 users of FACTON’s enterprise product costing platform will gather to share FACTON EPC user success stories, to discuss the latest developments from FACTON , and to learn about industry trends and their impact on product cost management. Speakers at the event include FACTON Chief Executive Officer Alexander M. Swoboda, FACTON customers TI Automotive and TE Connectivity, and FACTON partners P3 and Venteon. Swoboda described the event, “Engineers, financial managers, sales executives, and procurement experts will all join us to share stories about how they are using FACTON EPC to increase profitability, improve their customer relationships, and win new business.” The conference also features guest speaker, Adam Genei, Mobsteel/Detroit Steel Wheel Co. who will present his thoughts on The Reward is in the Work. Mobsteel is a design/build company that manufactures automotive aftermarket products and builds custom cars, while celebrating the history of the automobile and Detroit as the Motor City. Conference attendees will be able to view a custom Mobsteel car on display. For more information about Mobsteel visit http://www.mobsteel.com . About FACTONThe FACTON EPC Suite is the leading Enterprise Product Costing (EPC) solution for the automotive, aerospace, mechanical engineering and electronics industries. Its specific solutions offer robust answers to the requirements of executive management and individual departments within the enterprise. FACTON EPC enables standardized, enterprise-wide costing independent of location and department for maximum product cost transparency throughout every phase of the product life cycle. Businesses accelerate their costing, achieve pinpoint cost accuracy and secure their profitability. FACTON was founded in 1998 and has locations in Potsdam, Dresden, Stuttgart and Detroit. Hasso Plattner, founder and chairman of the supervisory board of SAP AG, has supported this innovative company since 2006. The international portfolio of customers includes Ford Motor Company, Henniges Automotive, Fisher & Company, DURA Automotive Systems, Airbus, Mahle Behr, MANN+HUMMEL, Porsche and other renowned manufacturers. ### Valerie Valentine | Marketing Manager | FACTON Inc. | Phone: +1 (248) 761-2255 | valerie.valentine[at]facton.com | http://www.facton.com/en

posts.author: Mohammad
posts.title: কুমিল্লা বিশ্ববিদ্যালয়ের স্নাতক ভর্তি পরীক্ষা স্থগিত
posts.text:
কুমিল্লা বিশ্ববিদ্যালয়ের স্নাতক ভর্তি পরীক্ষা স্থগিত Posted By: Mohammad on: Print 
উপাচার্য ভর্তি পরীক্ষা বানচালের চেষ্টা করেছেন শিক্ষক সমিতির এমন অভিযোগের মধ্যেই অনিবার্য কারণ দেখিয়ে কুমিল্লা বিশ্ববিদ্যালয়ের ২০১৭-১৮ শিক্ষাবর্ষের স্নাতক (সম্মান) শ্রেণির ভর্তি পরীক্ষা অনির্দিষ্টকালের জন্য স্থগিত করা হয়েছে। 
সোমবার সন্ধ্যায় উপাচার্যের বাসভবনের কার্যালয়ে ইউনিট প্রধানদের এক জরুরি সভায় এ সিদ্ধান্ত হয়। জানা যায়, সন্ধ্যা সাড়ে সাতটায় উপাচার্য অধ্যাপক ড. মো. আলী আশরাফের সভাপতিত্বে তার বাসভবনের কার্যালয়ে ইউনিট প্রধানদের সভায় ১৭ ও ১৮ নভেম্বরের ভর্তি পরীক্ষা অনিবার্য কারণ দেখিয়ে স্থগিত করা হয়। তবে কবে এ পরীক্ষা অনুষ্ঠিত হবে তা ওই সভায় সিদ্ধান্ত হয়নি। 
‘এ’ ইউনিট প্রধান এবং বিজ্ঞান অনুষদের ডিন ড. মো. আবু তাহের সভার বিষয়টি নিশ্চিত করেন। এ বিষয়ে সোমবার রাত আটটায় উপাচার্য অধ্যাপক ড. মো. আলী আশরাফের ব্যক্তিগত মুঠোফোনে যোগাযোগ করা হলে তিনি বিশ্রামে আছেন বলে বরাবরের মতো জানান তার বাসভবনের এক কর্মচারী। 
প্রসঙ্গত, উপাচার্যের বিরুদ্ধে নিয়োগ বাণিজ্য, আত্মীয়করণ, বিচারহীনতার সংস্কৃতি চালু, আর্থিক দুর্নীতির অভিযোগে তার বিচার ও অপসারণের দাবিতে ১৬ অক্টোবর থেকে তার কার্যালয়ে তালা ঝুলিয়ে আন্দোলন করছে শিক্ষক সমিতি ও বঙ্গবন্ধু পরিষদ। উপাচার্য ভর্তি পরীক্ষা বানচাল করার চেষ্টা করছেন বলে সোমবার এক মানববন্ধনে অভিযোগ করে শিক্ষক সমিতি। Post Views: ৭৭৯

posts.author: curitiba (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.text:
Brazil 



Lawyer accuses Moro's friend of brokering deal, newspaper says 
In a statement, the judge praised a friend and criticized a report by Folha de S.Paulo 



Attorney Rodrigo Tacla Duran, who worked for Odebrecht from 2011 to 2016, accuses labor lawyer Carlos Zucolotto Junior of brokering parallel negotiations with the Lava Jato Task Force. 

Zucolotto is a friend and best man of the judge Sergio Moro and was an associate of an office with Rosangela Moro, wife of the judge. The lawyer is also defender of the prosecutor Carlos Fernando dos Santos Lima in labor action that runs in the STJ (Superior Court of Justice). According to the Folha de S. Paulo newspaper, Zucolotto's talks with Tacla Duran would involve easing the penalty and reducing the fine that the former Odebrecht lawyer would have to pay in an award-winning deal. 


In return, according to Duran, Zucolotto would be paid by means of box two. The money would be used to "care" for the people who would help him negotiate, according to a correspondence between the two that the former Odebrecht lawyer says he has in his files. 

Zucolotto denies the charges. The prosecutors cited by Tacla Duran claim that they do not even know Moro's friend. Judge Sergio Moro pronounced, in a note, on the Folha de S. Paulo report: 

"About the subject 'Lawyer accuses Moro's friend of intervening in an agreement' written by the journalist Monica Bergamo and published on 08/27/2017 by the Folha de São Paulo newspaper, I hereby inform the following: 

- lawyer Carlos Zucoloto Jr. is a serious and competent lawyer, works in the labor area and does not work in the criminal area; - the report that the lawyer in question would have dealt with the fugitive accused Rodrigo Tacla Duran on an award-winning collaboration agreement is absolutely false; 

- none of the members of the Federal Public Ministry of the Task Force in Curitiba confirmed any contact of said lawyer on said matter or on any other matter because in fact no contact occurred; 

- Rodrigo Tacla Duran did not present to the journalist responsible for the matter any proof of his untrue statements and his report finds no support from any other source; 

- Rodrigo Tacla Duran is accused of money laundering of millions of dollars and had his preventive detention decreed by this judge, having taken refuge in Spain to escape the action of Justice; 

- the lawyer Carlos Zucoloto Jr. is my personal friend and I regret that his name is used by an accused fugitive and in an irresponsible journalistic matter to denigrate me; and 

- regrets the credit given by the journalist to the false report of an accused fugitive, having been warned of falsehood by all the persons mentioned in the matter. 

Curitiba, August 27, 2017. 
Sergio Fernando Moro 
Federal judge"

thread.title: Fonterra investeert in Rokiskio
thread.title_full: Fonterra investeert in Rokiskio

posts.author: James
posts.title: Fonterra investeert in Rokiskio
posts.text:
0 
AMSTERDAM , November 7, 2017 — 
Fonterra Co-operative Group uit Nieuw-Zeeland heeft een jarenlange commerciële overeenkomst met de grootste zuivelproducent van Litouwen, AB Rokiskio Suris, uitgebreid via een deelneming van 10 procent in de aandelen van de onderneming. Dalius Trumpa and Theo Spierings signing agreement between Rokiskio and Fonterra. (PRNewsfoto/Fonterra) 
(Photo: http://mma.prnewswire.com/media/597069/Fonterra_Co_operative_Group.jpg ) 
Fonterra, door Rabobank wat betreft omzet in 2017 geklasseerd als zesde zuivelonderneming wereldwijd, heeft € 7.1 miljoen in Rokiskio geïnvesteerd. Daarmee hebben zij een toeleveringslijn van hoogwaardige weiproducten zeker gesteld en tegelijkertijd productopties mogelijk gemaakt voor heel Europa en het Midden-Oosten. Dit biedt tevens mogelijkheden wat betreft bronnen van verdere zuivelproducten in het Baltische melksegment om te kunnen voldoen aan de groeiende vraag uit de nabijgelegen markten. 
Voorzitter John Wilson van Fonterra zei dat de investering nauwgezet overeenkomt met de strategie van Fonterra om wereldwijd de bronnen van melk in strategische locaties zoals Europa uit te breiden, zodat de coöperatieve groep aan de vraag van klanten dichtbij deze bronnen kan voldoen. 
“Onze landbouwers in New Zealand zullen altijd onze eerste bron voor melk blijven, maar we moeten ons steeds meer aanpassen aan onze groei en de daarbij behorende rendementen via strategische partnerschappen in Europa, Latijns-Amerika, Australië en China . Deze partnerschappen stellen ons in staat om de producten waar vraag naar is dichter bij de markt te produceren en bieden tevens meer mogelijkheden voor de melk en de melkproducten die we elders maken.” 
De CEO van Fonterra , Theo Spierings , verklaarde dat deze ontwikkeling gebaseerd is op de huidige, jarenlange relatie tussen Fonterra en Rokiskio als leverancier en voor beide bedrijven gunstig zal zijn. 
“Onze capaciteit om toegang te hebben tot wei-ingrediënten van hoge kwaliteit wordt steeds belangrijker naarmate de vraag groeit, vooral in de markten in Oost- en West-Europa, het Midden-Oosten en Noord-Afrika. Rokiskio is tevens een zeer gerespecteerde kaasproducent en dat biedt voor ons ook verdere mogelijkheden om aan de vraag van klanten in deze markten te voldoen. Dit is een nieuwe stap in onze strategie om een duurzaam Europees netwerk van bronnen te ontwikkelen, die een betrouwbare en doeltreffende toeleveringsketen en een aanvulling op de ingrediënten uit Nieuw-Zeeland zullen vormen.” 
Volgens de voorzitter van Rokiskio Suris, Dalius Trumpa , legt Rokiskio de nadruk op productkwaliteit en -veiligheid, naast prestaties op het gebied van milieu, en brengt de onderneming deze belangrijke sterke punten mee in de relatie met Fonterra. De productie onder contract met Fonterra heeft een rol gespeeld in de uitbreidingscapaciteit en de ontwikkeling van de onderneming in 2014 en 2016 en hij is optimistisch wat betreft de toekomstige groeimogelijkheden. 
“We hebben als commerciële partners vijf jaar lang nauw samengewerkt en in die tijd hebben we een sterke relatie opgebouwd. Met de investering van Fonterra in Rokiskio Suris klimt ons bedrijf op tot een nieuw en wereldwijd niveau, waardoor nieuwe exportmogelijkheden ontstaan die meer waarde in ons plaatselijke melksegment zullen voortbrengen,” aldus Mr. Trumpa. “Door Fonterra welkom te heten als aandeelhouder, kan de toekomstige groei worden versneld d.m.v. toegang tot nieuwe markten en investering in nieuwe technologieën.” 
Rokiskio beschikt over drie fabrieken in Litouwen en produceert kaas, boter, weiproteïne en melkpoeder. Het bedrijf is één van de grootste en bekendste kaasproducenten in Centraal- en Oost-Europa en produceert elk jaar meer dan 30 duizend ton kaas. De onderneming exporteert naar de markten van zowel het Oosten als het Westen en produceert verder een breed assortiment verse zuivelproducten voor de Baltische gebieden. 
Over Fonterra 
Fonterra is een wereldleider op het gebied van zuivelvoeding en de voorkeursleverancier voor zuivelingrediënten van veel van 's werelds vooraanstaande voedingsmiddelenbedrijven. Fonterra is ook een marktleider met eigen consumentenmerken van zuivelproducten in Australië/Nieuw Zeeland, Azië/Afrika, het Midden-Oosten en Latijns-Amerika. Voor meer informatie: http://www.fonterra.com 
Over Rokiskio

posts.title: From $5 to a million bucks: Melbourne Cup punter strikes it big | Lismore Echo
posts.text:
Use this content by Alex Blair 
IT'S all over. This year's Melbourne Cup saw Rekindling surge to victory after starting the race at $15 odds. 
Rekindling, who was ridden by two-time Cup winner Corey Brown, placed ahead of Johannes Vermeer (second) and Max Dynamite (third). 
"I'm speechless, it's a dream to even come out and race here - and to do it again, I'm lost for words," Brown said after the race. 
The four-year-old horse was the youngest in this year's race. 
Here are all the biggest bets from a massive day of punting on the race that stopped the nation. 

'I'M IN SHOCK': LUCKY WINNER SNAGS $1 MILLION 
A TAB customer scored the most improbable win of Melbourne Cup day after he turned a $5 punt into seven figures. 
The man, who only wanted to be known as Dominic, from Mill Park in Victoria, entered a promotion which saw any TAB account customers who placed a bet on races 1 to 4 at Flemington entered into a draw. 
After becoming the lucky customer to have his name drawn, Dominic was asked to pick the winner of the Melbourne Cup. If his selection won, he'd win $1 million. 
Dominic selected Rekindling and sat back at home to watch his dream unfold. 
"I started the day working so I never could have imagined this," he said. "I was laying on the couch about to have a few bets when I got the call that I won the draw. I was actually home alone so I had to call a few mates who rushed over to watch with me." 
Dominic's entered the draw with a $5 each way bet on Land of Plenty in race three, which ran second. He said it was hard to describe his emotions after securing the life-changing haul. 
"I was just numb. It's a surreal feeling and I'm still in shock ... I never could have imagined this," he said. 
PUNTER LANDS $150,000 FROM $50 BET 
Rekindling made a lot of people rich today. 
One lucky punter has come away with $151,255 from a $50 boxed trifecta 
Another punter with the online bookmaker placed a $33 boxed trifecta for a return of $100,433. 
One punter actually picked the trifecta straight up, placing $20 to win $60,502. 
The victor Rekindling immediately shot to the $21 favourite for 2018's race. 
"Hats off to those punters, Rekindling was an unlikely hero but no doubt they'll celebrate their wins for a long time to come," sportsbet.com.au's Will Byrne said. 
OTHER NOTABLE BETS ON REKINDLING 
- $3,000 at $16 [to collect $48,000] 
- $2,500 at $17 [to collect $42,500] 
- $2,000 at $16 [to collect $32,000] 
- $2,000 at $15 [to collect $30,000] 
- $1,550 at $16 [to collect $24,800] 
- $1,500 at $15 [to collect $22,500] 
- $1,500 at $13 [to collect $19,500] 
- $1,500 at $12 [to collect $18,000] 
- $500 at $51 [to collect $25,500] 
- $350 at $51 [to collect $17,850] 
TAB'S BIGGEST FLOPS 
Johannes Vermeer - $10,000 at $11 
Wall Of Fire - $3,000 x $1,000 each way at $12/$4.25 
Humidor - $2,000 each way at $11/$4 
Almandin - $10,000 x $5,000 at $9/$3.15, $2,000 at $9, $3,000 at $9, $5,500 at $8.50, $4,000 at $8.50 
Marmelo - $10,000 at $7.50 
Big Duke - $1,000 each way at $21/$5.90 + $1,000 each way at $21/$6.35 
Gallante - $2,000 at $71 
Max Dynamite - $10,000 at $17

thread.title: [API] 2.5 메시지 루프
thread.title_full: [API] 2.5 메시지 루프 : 네이버 블로그

posts.author: 유주
posts.title: [API] 2.5 메시지 루프
posts.text:
API [API] 2.5 메시지 루프 3시간 전 URL 복사 본문 기타 기능 번역보기 http://blog.naver.com/yuju620/221134575407 김상형 저자의 "윈도우즈 API 정복 1"을 학습하면서 정리한 내용을 포스팅합니다.
2장은 API의 가장 기본적인 예제를 다루며 이곳에서 사용되는 함수들(WinMain, WndProc 등)을 분석합니다.
소스 코드도 밑에 첨부했습니다.
First.cpp 내 컴퓨터 저장 네이버 클라우드 저장 2장에서 다룰 API의 가장 기본적인 예제입니다.
소스 코드 First.cpp 결과 결과는 위와 같이 아무런 기능도 없는 윈도우입니다. 그러나 간단해 보여도 완전히 온전한 하나의 윈도우이므로 표준 윈도우가 가진 모든 기능을 다 발휘할 수 있는데, 타이틀 바를 드래그하면 윈도우의 위치가 옮겨지며 경계선을 드래그하면 크기가 변경되고 시스템 메뉴의 키보드 지원까지 완벽하게 작성되어 있습니다.
메시지 루프 윈도우즈를 메시지 구동 시스템(Message Driven System)이라고 하는데 이 점이 도스와 가장 뚜렷한 대비를 이루는 윈도우즈의 특징입니다. 윈도우즈는 프로그램의 실행 순서가 명확하게 정해져 있지 않으며 상황에 따라 실행 순서가 달리즈는데 여기서 말하는 상황이란 바로 어떤 메시지가 발생했는가를 의미합니다.
윈도우즈 프로그램에서 메시지를 처리하는 부분을 메시지 루프(Message Loop)라고 하며 보통 WinMain 함수의 끝에 다음과 같은 형식으로 존재합니다.
While(GetMessage(&Message, NULL, 0, 0)){
 TranslateMessage(&Message);
 DispatchMessage(&Message);
} 메시지 루프는 세 개의 함수 호출로 이루어져 있으며 전체 루프는 while문으로 싸여져 있어 무한히 반복되는 구조를 가지고 있습니다. 메시지 루프는 윈도우즈의 멀티태스킹을 지원하는 굉장히 중요한 역할을 하며 따라서 윈도우즈를 이해하기 위한 핵심 루프입니다. 세 개의 함수를 차례대로 살펴보겠습니다.
BOOL GetMessage(LPMSG lpMsg, HWND hWnd, UINT wMsgFilterMin, UINT wMsgFilterMax)
이 함수는 메시지 큐에서 메시지를 읽어들입니다. 메시지 큐(Message Queue)는 시스템이나 사용자로부터 발생된 메시지가 잠시 대기하는 일종의 메시지 임시 저장 영역입니다. 읽어들인 메시지는 첫 번째 인수가 지정하는 MSG 구조체에 저장됩니다. 이 함수는 읽어들인 메시지가 프로그램을 종료하라는 WM_QUIT일 경우 FALSE를 리턴하며 그 외의 메시지이면 TRUE를 리턴합니다. 따라서 WM_QUIT 메시지가 읽혀질 때까지, 즉 프로그램이 종료될 때까지 전체 while 루프가 계속 반복됩니다.
BOOL TranslateMessage(CONST MSG *lpMsg)
이 함수는 키보드 입력 메시지를 가공하여 프로그램에서 쉽게 쓸 수 있도록 합니다. 윈도우즈는 키보드의 어떤 키가 눌러지거나 떨어졌을 때 키보드 메시지를 발생시키는데 TranslateMassge 함수는 키보드의 눌림(WM_KEYDOWN) 메시지가 발생할 때 문자가 입력되었다는 메시지(WM_CHAR)를 만드는 역할을 합니다.
LONG DispatchMessage(CONST MSG *lpmsg)
이 함수는 메시지 큐에서 꺼낸 메시지를 윈도우의 메시지 처리 함수(WndProc)로 전달합니다. 이 함수에 의해 메시지가 윈도우로 전달되며 프로그램(정확하게 표현하면 윈도우 프로시저)에서는 전다로딘 메시지를 점검하여 다음 동작을 결정합니다. 이 함수가 메시지를 전달하면 다시 루프의 선두로 돌아가 다음 메시지를 기다립니다.

thread.title: El PP confía en el 155 como arma disuasoria contra el secesionismo
thread.title_full: El PP confía en el 155 como arma disuasoria contra el secesionismo

posts.author: PILAR SANTOS cordoba1@elperiodico.es MADRID
posts.title: El PP confía en el 155 como arma disuasoria contra el secesionismo
posts.text:
Casado cree que si los soberanistas ganan el 21-D ya no reactivarán el ‘procés’ PILAR SANTOS cordoba1@elperiodico.es MADRID 
El artículo 155 como «aviso a navegantes», como arma disuasoria para un futuro que según varias encuestas se puede dar: la victoria de los independentistas en las urnas el 21 de diciembre. Así lo ve el PP. Pablo Casado, vicesecretario de Comunicación del partido, defendió ayer que la aplicación de este precepto será clave en ese posible escenario con el objetivo de evitar que los soberanistas inicien otra vez «un proyecto que no lleva a ninguna parte». 
Casado volvía a poner sobre la mesa así la posibilidad de una nueva aplicación del 155 en caso de que se reedite una Generalitat independentista, una amenaza que ya lanzó la semana pasada Xavier García Albiol, líder y candidato del PPC. 
La intervención de la Administración catalana al amparo de ese precepto acabará cuando se forme el nuevo Gobierno catalán, según insiste la Moncloa, pero se podrá volver a activar si así lo considera Mariano Rajoy, avisa el PP. 
Casado, no obstante, ve difícil que los ciudadanos puedan volver a «escuchar las mentiras, la posverdad, las noticias falsas» que achaca a los independentistas. «Ya no va a colar que les va a reconocer todo el mundo, porque la gente se harta y la gente quiere que su hijo encuentre trabajo y no que tenga una bandera con una franja azul o no», aseguró en una rueda de prensa en la sede de Génova, tras la reunión del comité de dirección. En esa cita, presidida por Rajoy, se decidió que el líder del PP vaya el domingo a Cataluña a presentar a Albiol como candidato. El lugar está por confirmar. 
Tanto el jefe del Ejecutivo como el resto del Gobierno y los dirigentes del PP de toda España se van a implicar en la campaña. Fuentes del Partido Popular calculan que Rajoy irá a Cataluña «dos o tres veces» antes de la votación. No lo hace desde el pasado 15 de septiembre, cuando en un acto en Barcelona dijo: «Nos van a obligar a llegar a lo que no queremos llegar». Todavía no se había celebrado el referéndum del 1-O ni se habían visto las duras cargas policiales para impedir la votación. 
Los planes de los conservadores es hacer una campaña «muy visible» para dejar claro que el PP ha encabezado la operación para sacar «del atolladero» a Cataluña. Pero no olvidan a sus socios en la aprobación del 155, Ciudadanos y PSOE. Con ellos quieren «unir fuerzas» después del 21-D «para desbancar a los que han llevado a la ruina a Cataluña», afirmó Casado. 
Ni en el PSOE ni en el PSC quieren abordar este asunto todavía, informa Juan Ruiz Sierra. Guillermo Fernández Vara, presidente de Extremadura, abogó a las claras por la prisión preventiva incondicional. En Cataluña, señaló, los secesionistas han intentado imponer un «orden totalitario», por encima de la Constitución, un comportamiento que «tiene consecuencias penales» Noticias relacionadas

thread.title: Injured Finn out of the Ashes, but Moeen expected to be fit
thread.title_full: Injured Finn out of the Ashes, but Moeen expected to be fit

posts.author: Omnisport
posts.title: Injured Finn out of the Ashes, but Moeen expected to be fit
posts.text:
Injured Finn out of the Ashes, but Moeen expected to be fit By Omnisport 7 Nov 2017, 9:31 - 
Steven Finn has been ruled out of the Ashes after scans showed the England seamer has torn cartilage in his left knee. 
The fast bowler had been a doubt for the opening Test of the series with Australia at the Gabba after suffering the injury during practice in Perth last week. 
Finn - a late addition to the touring party amid the controversy surrounding Ben Stokes - was being monitored by England's medical team, but he will now return home after the extent of his injury was revealed by the England and Wales Cricket Board (ECB). 
"Steven Finn will miss the remainder of England's tour of Australia after scans revealed that he has a torn left knee cartilage," a statement read. 
"The Middlesex seamer sustained the injury during practice last week in Perth and will now return to the UK in the 48 hours where he will meet a knee specialist to ascertain whether he will have an operation. 
"England will announce his replacement for the rest of the tour in due course." Announcement: Steven Finn out of the #Ashes -- England Cricket (@englandcricket) November 7, 2017 
While news of Finn's departure from the tour will be a blow for Joe Root's side, there was more positive news on the fitness of all-rounder Moeen Ali. 
Moeen missed last week's warm-up game against a Western Australia XI due to a side strain, which will also sideline him in the match against a Cricket Australia XI starting in Adelaide on Wednesday, but coach Trevor Bayliss expects him to be ready for the opener in Brisbane. 
"Moeen will be fine," he said. "We'll probably leave him out of the first game as a precaution, but he'll play the last game before the first Test." Let us send you our Newsletter Our editors will email you a roundup of their favourite stories from across AOL Sign up using your AOL email or

thread.title: Liebste Winterpullover
thread.title_full: Liebste Winterpullover

posts.author: Daniela Kreiner (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Liebste Winterpullover
posts.text:
Meine Kinder sind wählerisch, beide. Die Tochter mag nur rosa, lila, pink und glitzerrosa... außerdem Pferde oder Einhörner. Der Sohnemann will hauptsächlich Selbstgenähtes, er nölt schon die ganze Zeit, dass ich ihm endlich neue Jeans nähen muss. Er hasst bei den  Kaufhosen insbesondere die Knöpfe, die schlecht zuzumachen sind und dann doch wieder aufgehen. Ich bin somit ständig am Nähen für die Monster. Diesmal waren warme Winterpullis für den Weg zum Kindergarten gefragt. Dazu hab ich endlich den warmen und wunderschönen Wintersweat vom Pumuckl Stoffversand angeschnitten. Die Farben sind so strahlend und dass sogar nach dem Waschen noch. Bislang haben wir kein Waschpeeling; da hab ich mit anderen Sweathirtstoffen von Markenherstellern schon schlechte Erfahrungen gemacht. 


Trotz Mangels an Einhörner wurde dieser Pulli für meine Diva sofort zum Lieblingsteil. Ich finde ja auch, das ihr die Farben wirklich wunderbar stehen.  


Genäht habe ich hier übrigens wieder eine Marie nach dem tollen Schnittmuster von CinderellaZwergenMode . Damit sie nicht zu eng sitzt, habe ich zum einen eine Nummer größer genäht und zum anderen den Pullover an der Seite ein bisschen ausgestellt. 

Die zuckersüße Stickdatei mit dem Schneemann - und übrigens auch die folgende beim Pulli vom Sohnemann - ist von Sandra von kipikeeDesign. Ich hab mich riesig gefreut, dass ich bei ihr probesticken durfte. Sandra ist so eine Nette und wir hatten wirklich Spaß in der Gruppe. Ich hoffe, dass ich auch weiterhin dabei sein darf, denn Pläne für das kommende Jahr hat Sandra schon.   
Die Knöpfe, nach denen ich übrigens lange gesucht habe, habe ich bei DaWanda im Häkelladen gekauft. 
  
Mein Sohnemann trägt heute dieses kuschelig Teilchen. Leider haben wir es noch nicht geschafft, den süßen Elch am lebenden Objekt zu fotografieren. Meine Kinder sind nicht wirklich begeistert, wenn sie neue Teile prpbetragen sollen und ich muss sie meistens mit irgendetwas bestechen und da kann ich sehr kreativ sein. 



Morgen zeige ich euch, wer es sich auf den neuen Schlafsäcken vom Babybruder bequem gemacht hat. 

Schnitte: Melian von Melians kreatives Stoffchaos, Marie von CinderellaZwergenMode

(21) 점검자의 의견 「자동차관리법」 제58조제1항 및 동법 시행규칙 제120조제1항에 따라 중고차동차의 성능·상태를 점검하였음을
 확인합니다.
중고자동차 성능·상태 점점자 (인) 중고자동차 성능·상태 고지자 (인) 본인은 위 중고자동차성능·상태점검기록부를 교부받은 사실을 확인합니다. 년 월 일 매수인 (인)
※성능ㆍ상태 점검의 보증에 관한 사항등
1. 성능ㆍ상태 점검자 및 매매업자는 아래의 보증기간 또는 보증거리 이내에 중고자동차 성능ㆍ상태점검기록부
에 기재된 내용과 자동차의 실제 성능ㆍ상태가 다른경우 계약 또는 관계법령에 따라 매수인에 대하여 책임
을 집니다.
ㆍ자동차인도일부터 보증기간은( )일, 보증거리는 ( )킬로미터로 합니다.
(보증기간은 30일 이상, 보증거리는 2천킬로미터 이상이어야 하며, 그 중 먼저 도래한 것을 적용합니다.)
2. 중고자동차의 구조ㆍ장치 등의 성능ㆍ상태를 고지하지 아니한 자, 거짓으로 점검하거나 거짓 고지한 자는
「자동차관리법」 제80조제4호의 2 내지 제80조제4호의3에 따라 2년 이하의 징역또는 500만원 이하의 벌
금에 처합니다.
3. 성능ㆍ상태점검자가 성능점검에 중대한 과실이 있는 경우 자동차관리법 제21조제2항에 따른 행정처분
의 기준과 절차에 관한 규칙 제5조제1항에 따라 1차 사업정지 30일, 2차 사업정지 90일, 3차 사업취소
등의 행정 처분을 받습니다
4. 위 13은 사고로 자동차 주요 골격 부위의 판금,용접수리 및 교환이 있는 경우로 한정합니다. 단 루프패널,
쿼터패널, 사이드실패널 부위는 절단, 용접시에만 사고로 표기합니다.(후드, 프론트 휀더, 도어, 트렁크리
드 등 회판부위 및 범퍼에 대한 판금, 용접수리 및 교환은 단순수리로서 사고에 포함되지 않습니다.)
5. 위 14의 자기진단사항의 경우 중고자동차 성능,상태점검기록부에 기록하는 것 외에 자기진단기로 측정한 내
역을 매수인에게 고지하고 그 내역을 점검일부터 120일간 보관하여야 합니다.(전산정보처리조직에 의하여
보관할 수도 있습니다)
6. 성능점검 방법은 자동차 검사방법을 준용하여 점검 합니다.
7. 체크항목 판단기준
ㆍ미세누유(미세누수): 해당부위에 비치는 정도로 운행에 지장이 없다고 인정되는 부품 노후로 인한 형상
ㆍ누유(누수): 해당부위에서 오일(냉각수)이 맺혀서 떨어지는 상태
ㆍ소음/유격: 부품 노후로 인한 현상으로 결정하기에는 정도가 큰 소음 및 유격
ㆍ정비요: 현재 상태로 운행 시 해당 부품의 고장으로 운행에 지장을 받을 정도로 수리가 필요한상태
ㆍ부식: 차량 하부의 표면이 화학반응에 의해 금속이 아닌 상태로 상실되어 가는 현상
 (단순히 녹슬어 있는 상태는 제외합니다)
ㆍ침수: 전손처리 되거나, 자동차의 원동기, 변속기 등 주요장치 일부가 물에 잠긴 흔적이 있는 상태
※ 「자동차관리법」 제58조제1항에 따라 자동차 매수인은 원하는 경우 자동차가격 조사ㆍ산정서를 발급받을 수 있습니다.

thread.title: Sgonfia la pancia con questi cibi: ventre piatto mai più una chimera
thread.title_full: Sgonfia la pancia con questi cibi: ventre piatto mai più una chimera

posts.author: Manu (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Sgonfia la pancia con questi cibi: ventre piatto mai più una chimera
posts.text: I cibi anti pancia gonfia: il problema nasce anche dallo stress, un aiuto arriva dalla dieta Fodmap. Pancia piatta  mangiando i giusti cibi a tavola. La  ritenzione idrica  e il problema della pancia gonfia  non vanno sottovalutati considerando che pasti veloci, stress e sedentarietà creano la base ideale per ritrovarsi il ventre gonfio. Attenzione, perché non si tratta di grasso ma di accumulo di gas. Per evitare questo spiacevole problema alcuni cibi aiutano molto ma accanto a ciò che si mangia è fondamentale anche abbinare una buona attività fisica e ridurre lo stress psico fisico, non semplice quest’ultimo punto purtroppo. Le cause della pancia gonfia Quali sono le  cause della pancia gonfia ? Oltre al problema della dieta scorretta, di sedentarietà e stress anche l’accumulo di gas favorisce il ventre gonfio così come mangiare molto velocemente, pratica che ci fa ingurgitare molta aria durante il pasto con la conseguenza di ritrovarsi una pancia enorme. Il segreto parte da un regime alimentare corretto con tanta frutta e verdura, tanta acqua e cibi mangiati piano masticando lentamente. Cibi che sgonfiano la pancia Ma quali sono i  cibi che aiutano a sgonfiare la pancia ? Tra gli eletti abbiamo i ravanelli e la papaya. Quest’ultima contiene molta acqua e vitamina C e favorisce la digestione mentre i ravanelli hanno proprietà diuretiche e detossinanti. Anche il carciofo si elegge a cibo anti pancia gonfia grazie alla funzione depurativa e l’azione digestiva così come la mela, che mangiata ogni giorno favorisce il transito intestinale o il finocchio che grazie all’aneto sgonfia la pancia e purifica. Si può bere una tisana al finocchio al giorno per tre mesi per notare i primi effetti. Un altro cibo da non sottovalutare è l’ananas ricco di fibre e acqua oppure il limone che incoraggia il drenaggio dei liquidi. Citiamo, infine, gli sparagi e i kiwi pieni di vitamine e alleati per contrastare i gas. Da evitare, invece, tutte le bevande gassate, deleterie per chi soffre di pancia gonfia così come gomme da masticare, cibi con troppi grassi e zuccheri raffinati. E poi c’è la dieta Fodmap Un valido aiuto arriva anche dalla  dieta Fodmap  ossia Fermentable Oligo-saccharides, Disaccharides, Monosaccharides and Polyols. Si tratta di un regime alimentare ipocalorico e ipoglicemico da seguire per circa due mesi e che ha come risultato proprio eliminare il gonfiore al ventre (il nome particolare ci ricorda la  dieta chetogenica ). Nella prima fase si tolgono tutti gli alimenti “fodmap” a cui sostituire cibi come quinoa, riso e mais e frutta come banane, arance e melone. Nella seconda fase si vanno e reintrodurre piano piano i cibi fodmap. Essenziale inserire nella propria alimentazione alimenti senza lattosio, carne e pesce, bevande vegetali, patate, mais, avena e via dicendo.

posts.title: Ferito a colpi di pistola in strada, 30enne gambizzato a Bitonto
posts.text:
Allarme maltempo nel Barese, la Protezione civile: "Pioggia, vento forte e mareggiate fino a martedì" 
Sarebbe stato ferito a colpi di pistola alle gambe dopo una lite avvenuta in piazza Cattedrale, a Bitonto. Vittima dell'episodio, avvenuto nella tarda serata di lunedì, un 30enne. A riferire l'accaduto è stato lo stesso giovane, che si è presentato al Punto di primo intervento cittadino per essere medicato. 
In seguito è stato trasferito all'ospedale San Paolo di Bari. Sull'episodio indagano i carabinieri. Potrebbe interessarti 
Attendere un istante: stiamo caricando i commenti degli utenti... Commenti

thread.title: Vali Patlamanın Yaşandığı Okulda
thread.title_full: Vali Patlamanın Yaşandığı Okulda

posts.title: Vali Patlamanın Yaşandığı Okulda
posts.text:
Zonguldak Valisi Ahmet Çınar, Çaycuma ilçesinde patlamanın yaşandığı okulda incelemelerde bulundu. 
Zonguldak Valisi Ahmet Çınar, Çaycuma ilçesinde patlamanın yaşandığı okulda incelemelerde bulundu. 
Çaycuma Mesleki Teknik ve Endüstri Meslek Lisesi'nin kalorifer kazanının bulunduğu tek katlı binada patlama meydana geldi. Sabah saatlerinde yaşanan olayda Selahattin Köse isimli işitme engelli hizmetli yaşamını yitirdi. 
Olayda Lise Müdürü Ali Gücük, okulun müdür yardımcısı Durmuş Uçar, kalorifer dairesi görevlisi Süleyman Uçar ile öğrencilerden Gürkan Taşçı, Serhat İlgen, Ümit Yağcı ve Ergün Uzun yaralandı. Ambulanslarla kaldırıldıkları hastanede tedavileri tamamlanan yaralıların sağlık durumlarının iyi olduğu belirtildi. 
Öte yandan Zonguldak Valisi Ahmet Çınar, beraberindeki heyetle birlikte okul bahçesinde incelemelerde bulundu. İnceleme sonrası gazetecilere açıklamalarda bulunan Vali Ahmet Çınar, yaşanan kazaya ilişkin soruşturmanın sürdüğünü ifade etti. Olayın akabinde doğalgaz sistemine geçmek için çalışmalara başlandığını ifade eden Çınar, şöyle dedi: 
"Yaşanan kaza olay teknik sistemden kaynaklı bir olay mı yada insan hatasından mı kaynaklı bunun araştırmasını, itfaiye, biz ve teknik ekipler inceliyorlar. Konu aynı zamanda adli olay, savcılığımız bu konuyu takip ediyor. Bizler de idari yönden takibini yapıyoruz. Rapordan sonra hatanın nereden kaynaklandığı belli olacak. Sistemden mi yoksa kişiden mi kaynaklandığını da söylemek gerekir. Sistem yeni bir sistem. Halihazırda 2-3 yıllık bir sistem. Dolayısıyla yaşanan elbette üzücü. Takibi yapılıyor, gereği yasal anlamda yapacağız. Bir işitme engelli işçimiz vefat etti. Okul müdürümüz, bir yardımcımız, bir öğretmen, dört öğrencimiz hafif şekilde yaralandılar. Kontrolleri yapıldı, hastanede hiç kimse yok. Herkesin sağlık durumu gayet iyi. Ama bir işçimiz söylediğim gibi vefat etti. Hemen bu patlamanın akabinde bu görüntülerde eğitimin doğru olmayacağını düşündük. Bugün yıkılmış olan enkaz kısmını hemen kaldıracağız. Okulun da doğal gaz sistemine geçişi için işlemleri başlattık. En hızlı şekilde bunu yapacağız. Ve öğrencilerimizin eğitiminde bir sorun olmayacak. Eğitim devam edecek. Onun tedbirini alıyoruz." 
Okulda eğitime bir gün ara verildi. Savcılıkça başlatılan soruşturma devam ediyor. Okulun bahçesindeki kalorifer kazanının bulunduğu binanın yanındaki tek katlı kantin binasında da maddi hasar meydana geldi. 
( Sertaç Özdemir - Emrah Yıldız/İHA)
